metadata.subject: Performing arts
Arts du spectacle
metadata.title: Alberta performing artists
metadata.creator: Alberta. Alberta Culture
Alberta. Alberta Culture and Multiculturalism
Alberta. Performing Arts. Touring
Alberta. Arts Branch. Marketing and Audience Development Section
metadata.description:
Digitization of this title is in recognition of the service of Ms. Marjory Olsen, member of the University of Alberta Libraries 2014-2016 Students' Library Advisory Council.
"A directory of performing arts groups and individuals."
Following the 1980 issue and its 1981 supplement, the directory was published (from 1982 to at least 1993) every two years covering approximately a two year span
Issue for 1981 constitutes the supplement to the 1980 issue
Prepared 1980-199-? by Performing Arts, Touring; 199-?- by Arts Branch, Marketing and Audience Development Section
Imprint varies: 1988/89- , Alberta Culture and Multiculturalism
UA Library copy in the Richard Spafford Western Canadian Legacy Collection
